petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Security issues with main gate left open allowing non-residents access
Unsanitary conditions including ant/spider infestation and cloudy water

petitions.reimbursement: $460 ($230 for security gate issue, $230 for ant infestation)

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, gate issue was known to respondent
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Respondent testified gate was left open for parking; Water was tested by vendor and found safe
rationale.impactAssessment: Security compromised due to open gate allowing non-resident access
